00012 bool EnglishNounFilter::analyze(const TermList& Input, TermList& Output)
00013 {
00014         Output = Input;
00015 
00016         tagger_.tag(Output);
00017 
00018         TermList::iterator it = Output.begin();
00019         for(  ; it != Output.end(); ){
00020                 int length = it->length();
00021                 if(it->pos.substr(0,2).compare("NN") == 0)
00022                         it ++ ;
00023                 else
00024                         it = Output.erase(it);
00025         }
00026         return true;
00027 }
